issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
There are some common issues / warnings when using the CLI with Node 8:
{code}
Appcelerator Command-Line Interface, version 6.2.4
Copyright (c) 2014-2017, Appcelerator, Inc.  All Rights Reserved.

Finished Downloading & Installing com.appcelerator.apm
(node:42494) [DEP0013] DeprecationWarning: Calling an asynchronous function without callback is deprecated.
Finished Downloading & Installing hyperloop
(node:42494) [DEP0013] DeprecationWarning: Calling an asynchronous function without callback is deprecated.
{code}
We should go through all Titanium-related projects and resolve all warnings before the GA, including the app-build, module build, Hyperloop and whatever else.

comments.body: From description, looks like a dup of CLI-1266.
If a dupe we can close. Want to make sure Hans?
